descriptions: No textual evidence is cited, or the evidence provided is completely irrelevant to the analysis.
The textual evidence cited is inaccurate or does not support the analysis; understanding of the text is lacking.
Some textual evidence is cited, but it is partially accurate and/or weakly connected to the analysis.
Textual evidence is generally accurate and supports the analysis, but connections could be stronger or more explicit.
Textual evidence is accurate and clearly supports the analysis; inferences are logical and well-reasoned.
Textual evidence is precise, insightful, and strongly supports a sophisticated analysis; inferences demonstrate a deep understanding of the text.
One or no pieces of textual evidence is cited, and it is insufficient to support the analysis or inferences drawn.
Few pieces of textual evidence are cited; may be insufficient to fully support the analysis or inferences drawn.
Several pieces of textual evidence are cited, providing adequate support for the analysis and inferences.
Multiple pieces of textual evidence are effectively used to comprehensively support the analysis and inferences.
A wide range of relevant textual evidence is expertly integrated to provide compelling support for a nuanced and insightful analysis.
No analysis or interpretation is provided; understanding of the text is not demonstrated.
Analysis is superficial or relies heavily on summarizing; interpretations are literal and lack depth.
Analysis is present but somewhat simplistic; interpretations are basic and may overlook nuances in the text.
Analysis demonstrates a good understanding of the text; interpretations are reasonable and supported by evidence.
Analysis is thoughtful and insightful, demonstrating a strong understanding of the text; interpretations are well-supported and consider multiple perspectives.
Analysis is sophisticated and original, revealing a deep understanding of complex themes and nuances in the text; interpretations are insightful, nuanced, and persuasively argued.
